name: ContractContactRole
description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on a Contract.
summary: The {ContractContactRole} object in the Salesforce application is used to represent the role of a contact in a contract. It has attributes such as Id, ContractId, ContactId, Role, IsPrimary, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, and IsDeleted. These attributes include references to other objects, picklist values, booleans, and datetimes to provide information about the contact's role in the contract.
label: Contract Contact Role
